headline: Fortinet, Inc. (FTNT) Downgraded to Hold Despite Strong Q4 as Analysts Warn of Margin Pressures
summary: Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) is one the Top 10 AI Stocks in Focus on Wall Street. Despite delivering fourth-quarter 2025 results that exceeded both market expectations and own guidance, Freedom Capital Markets analyst Almas Almaganbetov downgraded Fortinet (NASDAQ: FTNT) from Buy to Hold with a price target of $90.00 on February 17. The firm flagged valuation constraints for […]
